channel.title: Put a sticky in the questionss ection for moparscape
channel.description:
Take a look in the questions sections.
It's completly full of Where do I download moparscape, and it is full of "I r needing server ip!!!111"
Perhaps a sticky that could either re-direct them to the official moparscape thread, or a standalone with a small list of servers or where to find them. It isannoying how many people ask these stupid questions.

item.title: Put a sticky in the questionss ection for moparscape
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

lol its also one of those things where you want to sticky it, just to get them to shut up... but then you [or rather I] don't want to because eventually all the leechers etc will have to learn to use the search function.... or even just click in a forum that is relevant.

Read full topic
